title: Content Creator / UGC Video Editor (Project-Based)
job_overview:
READ ALL TO BE CONSIDERD 

We’re Hiring: Short-Form Video Editor (Vlog-Style Real Estate Content)

We’re looking for a creative, social-savvy video editor to turn raw real estate footage into **engaging, scroll-stopping vlog-style content** for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



You Should Be Able To:

- Edit full videos into 15–60 sec short-form clips
-Add captions, viral hooks, sound effects, emojis, and storytelling cuts
-Match the **authentic, high-energy vlog style** of our brand


Tools You’re Comfortable With:

-CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut, Upgrade to see actual info, Descript, etc.
-Must be fast, creative, and attention-to-detail driven


Style Reference:

Check our Instagram for tone + flow:

Upgrade to see actual info


View our Brand Kit & Inspiration Videos:

Upgrade to see actual info

Do NOT message us on Instagram — you’ll be disqualified.



REQUIRED TEST TO APPLY:

Download and edit this full video:

Upgrade to see actual info

MUST INCLUDE:

-Social-first
-High energy
-Thubnail
-Includes captions, hooks, and pacing that holds attention



Submit your test edit + portfolio to: Upgrade to see actual info

Subject Line: Video Editor Application – [Your Name]
